HL7v2xConformanceProfile.ImpNote:
This message is sent from VistA to SQWM when new allergies are added or removed (Entered in Error) for a patient through CPRS. The GMRA SIGN-OFF ON DATA and GMRA ENTERED IN ERROR protocols are used to trigger this message to SQWM.
SQWM uses snapshot mode to capture patient allergies so each time an update occurs the previous allergy list is replaced with the latest.
